name: puppeteer-to-istanbul-example
description: example of using puppeteer-to-istanbul to output istanbul reports from puppeteer coverage

scripts.screenshot0: rm -f tmp/aa.* && node screenshot.js && ls -l tmp/aa.*
scripts.screenshot: rm -f tmp/aa.* && npm_config_mode_coverage=node_modules ~/lib.utility2.sh shIstanbulCover screenshot.js && ls -l tmp/aa.*

author: Ben Coe <ben@npmjs.com>
